div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?
In 10 years, i will try to become my own boss.
If it's possible i want to open my own company where the goal will be reintegration of young criminal in the society by work and help poor people.
To succeed my dream i have started my studies on psychology to understand the human behavior and particularly to understand why some young people are so indomitable.
I hope create help for people we need because i think it's the only way to make the difference compared to current system.
